about_the_game:
『StanÇac -Sexy Tenacious Girls-』 is a side-scrolling SHOOT'EM UP with cute and sexy girls.
The character designs are reminiscent of 80's anime and the sexy elements create a different kind of SHMUP! The game is designed to be easy to understand with no complicated controls or rules, and the moderate number of bullets makes it easy to play even for those who are not good at shoot-'em-up!


"Soveraine Queene" an artificially segregated city made up entirely of women.The universal machine allows them to live without inconvenience, but then a large-scale riot breaks out. The protagonist, who belongs to the military, goes to quell the riot, but what she sees there is the sight of soldiers and rioters joining hands and going berserk. What's more, the leader of the riot is the head of the military. Bewildered by the incomprehensible situation, she sets out to suppress the rioters.



It's not a bullet-hell type of game, so it's designed to be friendly to beginners! (maybe...)
But if you keep looking at them, they'll get you soon enough!


The game can be operated with the keyboard and gamepad (using the names of the buttons on the XBox controller).

Direction pad/Left stick/Cursor keys: Player movement/cursor operation
A button/Z key: Shot/decision
B button/X key: Bomb/Cancel
X button/C key: Skip cut scene
MENU button / Esc key - Open menu

content_descriptors.notes:
May contain content that is not appropriate for all audiences or for viewing in the workplace.
In many scenes, breasts and buttocks are exposed, underwear is visible, and nudity is depicted.
There is no exposure of genitalia or depiction of sexual activity.
Some texts use swear words.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later Requires 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo /AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game was created using SHMUPCreator.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 『StanÇact』is a cute and sexy girl-on-girl SHOOT'EM UP. Mai, a military officer, is on her way to quell a riot, but the rioters and the military have teamed up and are on the rampage and the head of the military was the ringleader.Witness one woman's struggle to complete her mission amidst the chaos!
